steps.0: Waiting for Technical member to review pre-procurement evaluation requests
steps.2: Finalization of Technical Member's determination of Mode of Procurement and Comments
steps.3: DBMPS Checking, Finalization of BAC Resolution Recomending Mode of Procurement, Publication, and canvass form
steps.5: Release of Abstract of Bid and BAC Resolution
steps.7: Finalization of Notice of Award, Purchase Order/Letter Order, and Request for OS
steps.9: Transmittal to COA and University Supply Office for Audit
